Restaurant Application //pasta Pasta 
Cream Cheese 
Parmesan Cheese 
Olive Oil 
Garlic 
Salt Pepper Cook your pasta until al dente 
Saute’ garlic in olive oil until fragrant 
Add cream cheese, pasta cooking water, parmesan, and stir well 
Drain and add pasta to the skillet 
Toss until well combined, adding some pasta water if needed //maggi SERVED EVERY DAY SINCE 1990 Bubby’s opened on Thanksgiving Day 1990. Chef / Owner Ron Silver began baking pies and selling them to restaurants and his neighbors out of a small kitchen at the corner of Hudson and North Moore St. in Tribeca. Today, NYC’s beloved restaurant and pie shop celebrates 27 years of classic, made from scratch American cooking. Add one and half cup of water 
Add maggi noodles and boil it 
Add the maggi masala on to it 
Wait for 2 mins 
Maggi is ready! //cake Maggi Noodles
